title: Sexy And I Know It
lyrics: x2 When I walk on by, girls be looking like damn he fly I pay to the beat, walking on the street in my new lafreak, yeah This is how I roll, animal print, pants out control, It's real fool with the big afro They like bruce lee I got the glow Ohhh Ohhh Girl look at that body (x3) ooooo I'm sexy and I know it yeah Im sexy and I know it (3x) When I walk in the spot, this is what I see Everybody staring staring at me I got passion in my pants and I ain't afraid to show it ooooo I'm sexy and I know it yeah Im sexy and I know it (3x) When I'm at the mall, security just can't fight them off When I'm at the beach, I'm in a speedo trying to tan my cheeks, yeah This is how I roll, come on ladies it's time to go We headed to the bar, baby don't be nervous No shoes, no shirt, and I still get service Ohhh Ohhh Girl look at that body (x3) ooooo I'm sexy and I know it yeah Im sexy and I know it (3x) When I walk in the spot, this is what I see Everybody staring staring at me I got passion in my pants and I ain't afraid to show it ooooo I'm sexy and I know it yeah Im sexy and I know it (3x) wiggle, wiggle, wiggle, yeah (x3) A ooooo I'm sexy and I know it yeah Im sexy and I know it (3x)
